activity.The difference in the production rates and a comparison of the average production rates of the products obtained from optimized Ti-KIT-6-calcined (SiTi 100) photocatalyst is shown in Fig. 9.The results indicate that the 300 W lamp is more useful in this reaction than the 200 W lamp.The 300 W lamp has more photon power, more UVB intensity and produces a higher temperature, which boosts the CO 2 reduction path.Therefore, more fuel products are produced when the 300 W lamp is used.
